name: Teeth Cleaning & Scaling
description: Advanced non-surgical gum care using modern laser technology to remove plaque and tartar.

name: Tooth Filling
description: High-quality composite fillings to restore damaged teeth and prevent further decay.

name: Tooth Extraction
description: Safe and painless removal of severely damaged or impacted teeth.

name: Artificial Complete Denture
description: Custom-made full mouth dentures to restore smile and chewing function.

name: Dental Implants
description: Permanent replacement of missing teeth using biocompatible titanium implants.

name: Laser Dentistry
description: Minimally invasive laser treatments for faster healing and precision.

name: Root Canal Therapy
description: Treatment to remove infected pulp and save natural teeth.

name: Orthodontic Braces
description: Braces to correct misaligned teeth and improve bite.

name: Clear Aligners
description: Transparent removable aligners for discreet teeth straightening.
